      • VPKArchive

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public void load(java.io.File file)
          throws VPKException,
                 java.io.IOException
        Loads all entries from a VPK archive file.
        Parameters:
        file - VPK archive file. For multichunk archives, this must be the "_dir" index file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when the archive can't be read correctly
        VPKException - when a VPK file format error occured

      • getEntries

        public java.util.List<VPKEntry> getEntries()
        Returns a list of all VPK entries.
        Returns:
        VPK entry list

      • getEntriesForDir

        public java.util.List<VPKEntry> getEntriesForDir(java.lang.String dir)
        Returns a list of all VPK entries for the given directory. If the directory isn't used, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        dir - directory path
        Returns:
        VPK entry list inside the given directory

      • getEntriesForType

        public java.util.List<VPKEntry> getEntriesForType(java.lang.String type)
        Returns a list of all VPK entries for the given file type/extension. If the type isn't used, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        type - file type
        Returns:
        VPK entry list of the given type

      • getEntry

        public VPKEntry getEntry(java.lang.String path)
        Returns the VPK entry for the given path. If no entry with the path exists, null will be returned.
        Parameters:
        path - full file path
        Returns:
        VPK entry for this path

      • getVersion

        public int getVersion()
        Returns the version number of this VPK archive.
        Returns:
        VPK version

      • setVersion

        public void setVersion(int version)
        Sets a new version number for this VPK archive.
        Parameters:
        version - new version number
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the version number is outside the allowed range

      • isMultiChunk

        public boolean isMultiChunk()
        Returns true if this archive is split up into multiple chunk files.
        Returns:
        true if this is a multi-chunk archive

      • setMultiChunk

        public void setMultiChunk(boolean multiChunk)
        Sets if this archive should split up into multiple chunk files.
        Parameters:
        multiChunk - multi-chunk flag

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all loaded entries from this archive instance. This won't effect any data.
